attributes.action: Put A Stop To The Ban On XL Bully’s
attributes.additional_details: We urge the government to understand XL bully breeds as soft, kind, and loveable giants before taking drastic action. Informed decisions, expert input, and public education are essential for fair policies. Responsible ownership matters.
attributes.background: Seek balanced, fair dog-related laws. Emphasize responsible ownership; it's about owners, not breeds. Focus on education, enforcement, and collaboration, not breed bans.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar actions:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Introduce screening process for dog owners: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643631
